At that hour I went to the movies.

Él me dijo que yo iba al cine.
He told me that I went to the movies.
I will go to the movies.

Yo he ido a la playa.
I have gone to the beach.
(tú) You go there.
(tú) Yesterday you went to the movies.

We go there.

At that hour we went to the beach.

Todos los días nosotros íbamos al cine.
Every day we went to the movies.

We have gone there.

Todos los años él iba al cine.
